availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Clement Fisher (Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace )

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Fisher. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned 9 enslaved persons in Simpson County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Franklin, Kentucky in 1860. Owned 9 enslaved persons in Franklin, Simpson County, Kentucky in 1860. Nominated Justice of the Peace in Simpson County, Kentucky by Provisional Government of Kentucky on December 29, 1861.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 55.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, p. 395.Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 858Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, p. 309. KYR-0004-033-0038.
